allow: Bash(head -10 echo "" echo "==================================================================" echo "PROOF #4: Thread Safety Lock in multi_currency_system.py" echo "==================================================================" grep -n "_performance_lock" src/multi_currency_system.py echo "" echo "==================================================================" echo "PROOF #5: Input Validation in database.py" echo "==================================================================" grep -n "must be a non-empty string\|must be a positive integer" src/core/database.py echo "" echo "==================================================================" echo "PROOF #6: torch.load with weights_only=False" echo "==================================================================" grep -n "weights_only=False" src/multi_currency_system.py src/analysis_engine.py)
Bash(then timeout 10 venv/bin/streamlit run dashboard.py --server.headless true)
Bash(then echo "✅ Virtual environment exists at venv/")
Bash(# Trigger dashboard page load curl -s http://localhost:8501 sleep 8 # Check the logs cat /tmp/streamlit.log)
Bash(else echo "No venv found, using system python")

Bash(# Check for virtual environments or conda ls -d /home/development1/Desktop/Ai-Trade-Bot/venv || ls -d /home/development1/Desktop/Ai-Trade-Bot/.venv || ls -d /home/development1/Desktop/Ai-Trade-Bot/env ; find /home/development1 -maxdepth 4 -name ""streamlit"" -type f)
Bash(# Look for what happens AROUND the rejection - full context cat /proc/59830/fd/1)
Bash(# Kill old bot instance kill 59830 && sleep 2 && echo ""Killed"" || echo ""Already gone"" # Verify it''s dead ps aux)

Bash(# The import is: from src.data.provider import UnifiedDataProvider, Tick, Candle # but provider.py doesn''t exist. Let''s see what the git status is to understand state git -C /home/development1/Desktop/Ai-Trade-Bot status)

Bash(# The import says: from src.data.provider import UnifiedDataProvider, Tick, Candle # but provider.py doesn''t exist. Check what the committed version of runner.py imports vs the modified one git -C /home/development1/Desktop/Ai-Trade-Bot diff HEAD src/live_trading/runner.py)
Bash(# Check the committed version of runner.py import line for UnifiedDataProvider git -C /home/development1/Desktop/Ai-Trade-Bot show HEAD:src/live_trading/runner.py)
Bash(# Check if there''s still a provider.py somewhere in commit history / in a different location git -C /home/development1/Desktop/Ai-Trade-Bot log --all --oneline)

Bash(# Both HEAD and current runner.py import from src.data.provider which doesn''t exist as a .py file # Check if it''s installed as a package or if there''s something in __pycache__ ls /home/development1/Desktop/Ai-Trade-Bot/src/__pycache__/)
